column4: i'd like to strip down feisty to the bare minimum reqired for my laptop. can someone direct me to a comprehensive guide somewhere?
how can i get feisty to play real streams?
You could just install real player.
i cant find it in the repos.. where is it?
It's probably not in the repos. http://www.real.com/linux/
easy to install. not so easy to uninstall.
no its a .bin, which is basically a self contained package.
it contains the software, as well as a script to install it. you just execute it like this. ./foo.bin
aargh... is there an uninstall script as well?
I don't know for sure. But I would guess no.
Darx: There you go. A deb. so you can remove it with dpkg
